mapper.select: insert into INSEWarrantyPrice (id, downprice, upprice, warrantyprice, warrantyplan, isimported, warrantyperiod) values (#{id}, #{downPrice},#{upPrice}, #{warrantyPrice},#{warrantyPlan},#{isImported},#{warrantyPeriod})
select * from INSEWarrantyPrice where (#{carPrice} between downPrice and upprice) and warrantyplan=#{warrantyPlan} and isImported=#{isImported} and warrantyPeriod=#{years}
